snippet.title: Beta Battle Game Play: Gettysburg
snippet.description:
The 1st beta version game play video of Grand Tactician: The Civil War (1861-1865), showing one of the historic stand-alone battles in the game, the Battle of Gettysburg.

Playing as George G. Meade, in command of Army of the Potomac. Using a beta development version, which is subject to changes and improvements.

To learn more about Grand Tactician: The Civil War (1861-1865), visit the website at: 
http://www.grandtactician.com

Wishlist Grand Tactician at our Steam -page: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/654890/Grand_Tactician_The_Civil_War_18611865/
